column3: text

You arrive at Reegan's house - it's warm and inviting yet has a weird vibe of it's not real - sorta like it's got fake walls and a basement cell to keep people who wronged you but you try not to think about it.
You get a text telling you to walk straight in and go upstairs to the first door on the right - presumably his bedroom.
You're finally here! I've been waiting for ages.
I'm sorry - but I'm here now
It's fine - just don't do it again otherwise I'll lock you in the basement.. Haha just kidding!
Turns out you were right about the basement cell hunch
So - what do you wanna do?
I have something important to tell you
Okay?... Anything I should be nervous about?
No no.. well maybe... I just wanted to say I think you're really cute and I wanna pursue a relationship with you..
Oh.. Uh yea me too
Really!? Oh my - I'm so happy you think that. But there's one other thing too.
And that is?
Reegan transforms
Holy fu-
All of a sudden Reegan is no longer cute wholesome Reegan but in fact a devilish creature. It was terrifying
I thought that my incessant pestering would push you away - the fact I knew your address - what you were doing when I wasn't around.
Who wouldn't see that as a walking red flag?
B- but.. I don't understand, how??
*the end*
